ingredients.content: 2 sprigs fresh coriander, plus extra to garnish
pita bread croutons, to garnish (see tip)

preparations.content: Place simmering basket on top of mixing bowl lid, weigh in lentils and rice, hold under running water with aid of spatula to rinse and set aside to drain.
Place onions, garlic and oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add cinnamon, cumin, allspice and sauté <b>5 sec/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add carrots and chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add lentils, rice, vegetable stock, salt, black pepper and water, mix with spatula and cook <b>25 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add lemon juice, fresh coriander and blend <b>1 min/speed 5<b>-9, increasing speed gradually<b>. Serve with pitta croutons and garnish with chopped coriander leaves.
